Title: [ANN][PREICO] 🚀 🅱onum - Global backed loans and deposits on blockchain 🚀
Body: Press-release 05.12.17  Hi, everyone. Last weekend, our entire team gathered at our Vasilyevsky Island office.  Discussion topic: “How to ensure our ICO is successful and interesting for investors.”  1. First the product, then ICO!  We have decided that since our product is currently in testing, then we can surely introduce it to the public at the end of January:  · accept a deposit  · issue our first loan  · issue our first purpose loan  2. New platform service:  Only our Bonum platform has the world’s first purpose loan for Bitcoin, in addition to the non-purpose loans. This means that it becomes possible to attract more funds to cryptoeconomy, as well as to provide the borrower with crypto assets by installment.  3. Tokenomics:  Until today, our token has been marketed as a discount on loans or deposits. Now, the token holder is granted an opportunity to obtain additional income, which makes keeping it over the long term worthwhile.  As you know, with the Bonum platform, a loan with a reduced interest rate can be obtained, but in order to do so, you need to use one token per each dollar requested by the borrower.  Now token holders can lease their tokens and receive revenue directly (% of borrower’s savings, and not from the platform, otherwise it would be considered security).  Thus, we want to reduce the speculative sales of the token after the ICO is over. Holding tokens is beneficial both for investors, and those who wish to use our services.  The fewer tokens on the market, the greater the exchange value of the token. And the demand is supported by the number of loans issued via our platform.  Based on the information above, we’d like to announce the new roadmap  Q4 2017 — Start of the private presale, platform testing  Q1 2018 — Launch of the beta version of the platform, the first loan issued, ICO  Q2 2018 — Blockchain, smart contract testing  Q3 2018 —Security and performance testing, involving third-party auditors  Q4 2018 — Partner integration through an open API  2019 — Diversification and expansion of platform functionality, development of our own marketplace, active geographic expansion.
